snippet.title: Magic the Wandering - official announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Lemmings roguelike. Magic the Wandering is a puzzle platformer where you learn spells, discover powerful wizards, and build your party to guide them through the world.

Please wishlist the game on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3119240/Magic_the_Wandering/
